title: LISTEN: Sunday Supplement podcast - January 21
description: Listen to the Sunday Supplement podcast, with Alexis Sanchez, Jose Mourinho, Cyrille Regis and the sacking of Marco Silva on the agenda.
content: Neil Ashton was joined on the show by Matt Dunn (Daily Express), Neil Custis (The Sun) and Oliver Holt (Mail on Sunday) to discuss the latest big talking points in football.The panel debated Sanchez's potential impact at Manchester United, and how Arsenal will be set if they sign Henrikh Mkhitaryan and Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang this month.There was also live reaction of Marco Silva's sacking as Watford manager, plus reaction from a mixed week for VAR.Listen to the Sunday Supplement podcast and subscribe to more via iTunes
